reason: Strong regulatory tailwinds are emerging with President Trump's stated aim to sign a major crypto bill, positioning the U.S. as a potential crypto capital. This political support, coupled with tangible advancements in Real-World Asset (RWA) tokenization (Ondo Finance on Solana), provides significant bullish catalysts. Bitcoin's bounce to $89,500 indicates current market strength. While the overall sentiment is highly positive, the market is in price discovery territory, and crypto remains inherently volatile, warranting an elevated risk score.
headlines: Want TradFi to embrace tokenization? Crypto's distribution strategy must mature
Trump aimes to sign major crypto bill 'very soon' in a push to make U.S. crypto capital of the world
Ondo Finance Brings 200+ Tokenized U.S. Stocks and ETFs to Solana
Strategy's lofty $440 price target defended at TD Cowen
Bitcoin bounces to $89,500 as Trump strikes calmer tone on Greenland acquisition in Davos
